text: For Iframes in custom modules, is there a way to hide the scroll bar? I want to keep the the ability to scroll but not show the scroll bar. I have tried the usual CSS tricks but didn't know if Hubl had a specific attribute it needed as nothing I have tried has worked.
I think you can do that in chrome
but i seem to recall for cross browser compat you need a parent div with overflow:hidden, and make the child slightly larger just enough to cut off scrollbar
<@UQHC5BWR3> This is likely what will be used as evidence for why I deserve to go to hell, but hey :smile: This is not exactly recommended, pretty sure it doesn’t conform to WCAG  :smile:
Haha this is awesome. No hell for you!
Hi All, Can we pull blogs from specific author using hubl?
